    • Method Detail

      • when

        public <T extends E> Render.As<C,E,T> when(java.lang.Class<T> valueType)
        Use this to specify which type of values should have custom rendering. The object returned by this method allows you to specify how to render the values.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type parameter of the cell value, for which you want custom rendering.
        Parameters:
        valueType - The type of cell value, for which you want custom rendering.
        Returns:
        The Render.As builder API step which expects you to provide a lambda for customizing how a cell is rendered.

                                           java.util.function.Predicate<Render.Cell<C,T>> valueValidator)
